title: Informal Simulation Learning Environment Design for Data Literacy Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: No Experience with Basic Statistical Concepts or Data Visualization Tools
context.additional_context: Preservice teachers simulate the process of collecting, analyzing, and interpreting data in real classroom settings and undertake projects using open-data portals.

learning_goals: Learners can extract curriculum-linked datasets with 90% accuracy using basic navigation functions of a public data portal in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can analyze error cases encountered during simulation tasks and clearly explain at least three issues in data processing stages.
Learners can complete project deliverables while documenting decision-making rationales in the data interpretation process at over 80% accuracy through peer and self-assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
